rev.comment: 4chan should be avoided as a source of content

==Significant events==
==Significant events==
â
[[File:Bitcoin crash 2011-06-19.png|thumb|right|400px|A plot of Bitcoin/USD exchange transactions made on 19 June 2011. (Not shown: quick recovery of the market to $15 and the subsequent [[Rollback_(data_management)|rollback]] of all transactions attributed to fraud.)]]
 
*Within May 2011, the price of Bitcoin rose by over 1000%, to double digit values of almost 30 USD per bitcoin at peak price. The price of bitcoin prior was just over one USD per bitcoin.<ref>Vitalik Buterin, 14 May 2011, [http://bitcoinweekly.com/articles/causes-behind-the-bitcoin-price-rally Causes behind the Bitcoin Price Rally], Bitcoin Weekly</ref><ref name="mick">Jason Mick, 19 June 2011, [http://www.dailytech.com/Inside+the+MegaHack+of+Bitcoin+the+Full+Story/article21942.htm Inside the Mega-Hack of Bitcoin: the Full Story], DailyTech</ref>
*Within May 2011, the price of Bitcoin rose by over 1000%, to double digit values of almost 30 USD per bitcoin at peak price.
